name: Essence Ring
description: An ancient bauble blessed by the breath of Verodicia.

abilities.name: Life Essence
abilities.description: Increases the caster's current and maximum health for a short time.
notes: Interrupts the caster's channeling abilities upon cast
First increases maximum health, keeping the current health value. The current health percentage is not kept
Then increases the current health by the same amount. This does not count as a heal and bypasses any heal manipulation
Upon losing the buff, reduces maximum health, keeping the current health value. The current health percentage is not kept
This means the current health bonus is not reverted
Multiple instances of the buff do not stack. A re-cast increases the current health again, and refreshes the existing buff

additionalInfo: Acquired by crafting with Madstone. See the Madstone article for crafting mechanics
When crafted with the Dormant Curio, the health bonus is increased by 30%
